body:
Comment 1: 
Yes, http://tip.golang.org/doc/install says "CentOS/RHEL 5.x not supported"

Go 1.1 will be ~1 year newer than Go 1.0.  If Go 1.0 worked on a 5 year old operating
system, it's not necessarily a regression that Go 1.1 doesn't work on a 6 year old
operating system.

Another way to look at it: you haven't upgraded your operating system in 5 years. Why
are you updating Go?
